content.question: Public goods are typically provided by the government, because private markets tend to

choices.label: produce less than the socially optimum quantity
produce more than the socially optimum quantity
charge a monopoly price that is greater than the marginal social cost
charge a monopoly price that is less than the marginal social cost

content.answer: produce less than the socially optimum quantity
